titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 41999D0005 English
The Schengen acquis - Decision of the Executive Committee of 28 April 1999 on updating the Sirene manual (SCH/Com-ex (99) 5)

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: The Schengen acquis - Decision of the Executive Committee of 28 April 1999 on updating the Sirene manual (SCH/Com-ex (99) 5)
body.p: Having regard to Article 132 of the Convention implementing the Schengen Agreement,
Having regard to Article 108 of the abovementioned Convention,
The Sirene Manual has been updated; the new version (SCH/OR.SIS-SIRENE (99) 64) is attached to this Decision(1).
